Police arrest 36-year-old who allegedly threatened to kill with weapon at Newmarket petrol station https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-arrest-36-year-old-who-allegedly-threatened-to-kill-with-weapon-at-newmarket-petrol-station/2WGTGYNV2JFJFNGK4YQ436RA5U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-arrest-36-year-old-who-allegedly-threatened-to-kill-with-weapon-at-newmarket-petrol-station/2WGTGYNV2JFJFNGK4YQ436RA5U/ Police said they responded to an incident at a BP station on Khyber Pass Rd on Saturday. Sun, 31 Mar 2024 04:00:28 +0000 A 36-year-old man has been arrested after allegedly threatening to kill someone with a weapon they were wielding at a BP petrol station in Newmarket. Image / Google
Christchurch man Praneel Chand assaults elderly widow as she gardens, chases girl through park https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-man-praneel-chand-assaults-elderly-widow-as-she-gardens-chases-schoolgirl-through-linwood-park/IUQYG3UHTBDZXA2YVHB6E5HLB4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-man-praneel-chand-assaults-elderly-widow-as-she-gardens-chases-schoolgirl-through-linwood-park/IUQYG3UHTBDZXA2YVHB6E5HLB4/ Emily MoorhouseThe woman now suffers from flashbacks, while the schoolgirl has become withdrawn. Sun, 31 Mar 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Christchurch man Praneel Chand approached the elderly woman from behind while she was on her hands and knees gardening and assaulted her. Photo / 123rf
Police investigate alleged assault after rainbow flag raised on Norfolk Pine tree outside Destiny Church in South Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigate-alleged-assault-after-rainbow-flag-raised-on-norfolk-pine-tree-outside-destiny-church-in-south-auckland/ YW6O6ARKXFGP7EI2OMHOU66MVQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigate-alleged-assault-after-rainbow-flag-raised-on-norfolk-pine-tree-outside-destiny-church-in-south-auckland/ YW6O6ARKXFGP7EI2OMHOU66MVQ/ The pride flag was raised after two rainbow crossings were painted out this week. Sun, 31 Mar 2024 03:24:57 +0000 Zane Wedding flew a rainbow flag over Destiny Church in Wiri. Photo / NZME

Banking Ombudsman Nicola Sladden refuses compensation for $100,000 scam victim, says banks can’t be compelled to check for fraud https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watchdog-refuses-compensation-for-100k-scam-victim-says-banks-cant-be-compelled-to-check-for-fraud/5XLD35BOVBHIXIYQYXV77EW5FY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watchdog-refuses-compensation-for-100k-scam-victim-says-banks-cant-be-compelled-to-check-for-fraud/5XLD35BOVBHIXIYQYXV77EW5FY/ Lane NicholsThe watchdog says banks can't be forced to monitor for references to known scams.
